sentences.english: This paper comments on the effect of corpus empirical studies on lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 論述了語料庫實證研究對詞彙學的影響和作用。
本文是一項基於語料庫的研究。

sentences.english: This paper first explores unsupervised part-of-speech tagging for Chinese via monolingual corpus.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先探索了基於單語料庫的無監督中文詞性標註。

sentences.english: Corpus, non caro" is his own description of the angelic body."
sentences.chinese: “語料庫，非卡羅”是他自己的描述天使機構。

sentences.english: This contains the linguistic corpora that are analyzed and processed in the book.
sentences.chinese: 包含本書中分析和處理的語言語料庫。

sentences.english: This paper comments on the of effect of corpus empirical studies on lexicology.
sentences.chinese: 論述了語料庫實證研究對詞彙學的影響和作用。

sentences.english: I close my eyes to the world, Kiss my skinless corpus.
sentences.chinese: 我閉上眼睛世界，親親我去皮語料庫。

sentences.english: So the study of emotional feature extraction based on merge-database is significative.
sentences.chinese: 因此，對特徵的混合語料庫研究是有現實意義的。

sentences.english: It turns out that Corpora have great advantages in lexicography.
sentences.chinese: 語料庫在詞典編纂中具有強大的優勢。

sentences.english: Besides, it improves the way of the automatic words segmentation.
sentences.chinese: 另外，對語料庫構建過程中的自動分詞技術進行改進。

sentences.english: As TED translates hundreds of talks, they’re creating “parallel corpora”, the raw material for machine translation systems.
sentences.chinese: 平行的語料庫，這是機器翻譯系統的原始資料。

sentences.english: This paper describes a corpus for speech synthesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了一個語音合成語料庫。

sentences.english: The annotated corpus of Song Dynasty poetry is the foundation of the computer-based study of Song Dynasty poetry.
sentences.chinese: 全宋詞切分語料庫的建立是計算機研究宋詞的基礎。

sentences.english: In conclusion, some suggestions concerning the pedagogical implications of corpus-based study to English teaching in China are made.
sentences.chinese: 並探討了基於語料庫的研究對英語教學所帶來的啓示。
